author: Fauth, Camille and Vaxelaire, Béatrice and Rodier, Jean-Fran ̧cois and Volkmar, Pierre-Philippe and Bouarourou, Fayssal and Hirsch, Fabrice and Sock, Rudolph
title: Etude acoustique de voyelles soutenues produites par des patients opérés de la thyroïde souffrant ou non de paralysies récurrentielles (An Acoustic Study of Sustained Vowels produced by Patient with or without Unilateral Paralysis after thyroid Surgery.) [in French]
booktitle: Proceedings of the Joint Conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2012, volume 1: JEP
